about_the_game:
Blast off into a universe of mysterious moon bases and bizarre alien worlds. This asset pack brings to life the strange and wonderful creatures that inhabit these otherworldly landscapes. Explore the unknown, and create the extraordinary. A new adventure awaits beyond the stars!

Alien Planets is a new expansion pack for the Omega Modern RPG Pixel Asset style.

Contents:

* New unique alien planet biomes (two alien worlds plus the Moon and Mars!)
* Sixteen new character sprites: astronauts and aliens!
* Space rocket interior and exterior tiles.
* Includes a starry space panorama background.
* Designed to work with the original Omega Modern resource pack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
